how-to-play: If you need help configuring your game or are new to PlayQ4, you can read our beginner's guide [here](https://github.com/PlayQ4/wiki/blob/main/wiki/guide/guide.md)
wiki:
Our [Wiki](https://github.com/PlayQ4/wiki/blob/main/README.md) provides general information about Quake IV and our own services such as our [launcher](https://github.com/PlayQ4/wiki/blob/main/wiki/pq4/launcher_en.md), [queue-system](https://github.com/PlayQ4/wiki/blob/main/wiki/pq4/queue_en.md) and [hud-editor](https://github.com/PlayQ4/wiki/blob/main/wiki/pq4/hud_editor_en.md).

https://github.com/PlayQ4/wiki
